Question.Subject: I'd like to sound stoned over the Internet?
Question.Content:
I'm trying to make my friend think that i used drugs just to ''prank'' him and i know you typ differently when you're high.
What do i have to change in my sentences or what am i supposed to do?
Question.ChosenAnswer: I would presume that you would keep your answers short, occasionally make spelling mistakes and occasionally write a word that doesn't make sense with the rest of the sentence. You could maybe say sorry a lot as well.

Answer.Content: I would presume that you would keep your answers short, occasionally make spelling mistakes and occasionally write a word that doesn't make sense with the rest of the sentence. You could maybe say sorry a lot as well.
Answer.Reference: I do not have any experience of doing this but it sounded funny :)

Answer.Content: first of all, thats weird, but anyways, just go ahead and skip out on some letters and add a couple too, like if your going to say the word whats, put wutss, but thats my opinion;)
